Feature.Name: Basket feature
Feature.Label: Story-4
Feature.Description: In order to buy products As a customer I want to add products to basket

Step.Name: Given product is out of stock
When customer adds it to basket
Then product addition is unsuccessful
Then basket does not contain product

Scenario.Name: Successful addition
Scenario.Label: Ticket-7

Step.Name: Given product is in stock
When customer adds it to basket
Then product addition is successful
Then basket contains product
Then product is removed from stock
Step.StatusDetails: Product removal from stock is not implemented yet

Scenario.StatusDetails: Step 5: Product removal from stock is not implemented yet

Feature.Name: Contacts management
Feature.Label: Story-6
Feature.Description: In order to maintain my contact book As an application user I want to add, browse and remove my contacts

Scenario.Name: Contact book should allow me to add multiple contacts
Scenario.Label: Ticket-8

Step.Name: Given my contact book is empty
When I add new contacts
Then all of expected contacts would be available in contact book

Scenario.Name: Contact book should allow me to remove all contacts
Scenario.Label: Ticket-9

Step.Name: Given my contact book is filled with many contacts
When I clear it
Step.StatusDetails: Contact book clearing is not implemented yet. Contacts are removed one by one.

Step.Name: Then contact book is empty

Scenario.StatusDetails: Step 2: Contact book clearing is not implemented yet. Contacts are removed one by one.

Scenario.Name: Contact book should allow me to remove contacts
Scenario.Label: Ticket-9

Step.Name: Given my contact book is filled with contacts
When I remove contact
Then contact book does not contain removed contact any more
Then contact book still contains other contacts

Feature.Name: Invoice feature
Feature.Label: Story-2
Feature.Description: In order to pay for products As a customer I want to receive invoice for bought items

Step.Name: GIVEN Product "wooden desk" is available in products storage
AND Product "wooden shelf" is available in products storage
WHEN Customer buys product "wooden desk"
AND Customer buys product "wooden shelf"
THEN Invoice is sent to customer
AND Invoice contains product "wooden desk" with price of "ÂŁ62,00"
AND Invoice contains product "wooden shelf" with price of "ÂŁ37,00"

Feature.Name: Login feature
Feature.Label: Story-1
Feature.Description: In order to access personal data As an user I want to login into system

Scenario.Name: Anonymous login name should allow to log in
Scenario.Label: Ticket-3

Step.Name: Given user is about to login
Given user entered anonymous login
When user clicked login button
Then login is successful
Step.StatusDetails: Login should succeeded Expected: True But was: False

Step.Name: Then welcome message is returned containing user name

Scenario.StatusDetails: Step 4: Login should succeeded Expected: True But was: False

Step.Name: Given user is about to login
Given user entered valid login
Given user entered valid password
When user clicked login button
Then login is successful
Then welcome message is returned containing user name

Scenario.Name: Wrong login provided causes login to fail
Scenario.Label: Ticket-2

Step.Name: Given user is about to login
Given user entered invalid login
Given user entered valid password
When user clicked login button
Then login is unsuccessful
Then invalid login or password error message is returned

Scenario.Name: Wrong password provided causes login to fail
Scenario.Label: Ticket-2

Step.Name: Given user is about to login
Given user entered valid login
Given user entered invalid password
When user clicked login button
Then login is unsuccessful
Then invalid login or password error message is returned

Feature.Name: Payment feature
Feature.Label: Story-5
Feature.Description: In order to get desired products As a customer I want to pay for products in basket

Feature.Name: Product spedition feature
Feature.Label: Story-3
Feature.Description: In order to deliver products to customer effectively As a spedition manager I want to dispatch products to customer as soon as the payment is finalized

Scenario.Name: Should dispatch product after payment is finalized
Scenario.Label: Ticket-5

Step.Name: GIVEN There is an active customer with id "ABC-123"
GIVEN Customer has product "wooden shelf" in basket
GIVEN Customer has product "wooden desk" in basket
WHEN Customer payment has been finalized
THEN Product "wooden shelf" has been dispatched to customer
THEN Product "wooden desk" has been dispatched to customer
